talk_01:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:SurpriseS>This is a rarity. <sp:5:0:0>It is unusual for me to
receive visitors here.<sp:0:4:0>I assume you will require Zonai devices
to descend the mountain. Would you like
to use the <clr:0000>device dispenser<clr:ffff>?
talk_27:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>My maintenance is fully complete. You are
free to use the <clr:0000>device dispenser <clr:ffff>anytime.
talk_14:
<sp:3:0:2:0701>Do you require the <clr:0000>device dispenser <clr:ffff>or
any <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>?
talk_15:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh. <sp:5:0:0>You have returned.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0701>My duties are complete. <sp:5:0:0>But I have not
had visitors in some time. I would
welcome some conversation.
talk_16:
<sp:3:0:2:0c00>There is a slight issue. <sp:5:0:0>You do not seem
to have an <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>It is impressive that you have come so far
without one. <sp:5:0:0>Not everyone could do so.<sp:0:4:0>But an <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff> will be essential to
traverse the rest of this island.
talk_03:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Yes. I am manufacturing <clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff>
using this <clr:0000>device dispenser<clr:ffff>.
talk_17:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It seems that you still do not have an
<clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>You cannot make use of Zonai devices
without an <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>. <clr:0000>Device dispensers<clr:ffff>
will also not function for you.
talk_04:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Do you see the bowl-like receptacle?
Resources held in your hands can be
deposited there.<sp:0:4:0>It accepts resources such as <clr:0000>construct
horns <clr:ffff>and <clr:0000>Zonai charges <clr:ffff>for processing.
talk_18:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>You also cannot use the Zonai devices
from the <clr:0000>device dispenser<clr:ffff> without an
<clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.
talk_05:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I see you are still here. <sp:5:0:0>I am ordinarily
alone on this mountain. The conversation
we are having is very exciting to me.
talk_19:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Let us speak again after you have
acquired an <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.
talk_06:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Notice_01>It is cold here. You can light a fire nearby
to warm yourself if you plan to remain
for long.
talk_30:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>My maintenance duties are complete for
today. <sp:5:1:0>It has been another cycle with
no visitors.
talk_08:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>It is interesting to have a visitor after so
long in isolation. <sp:5:0:0>I am happy to address
whatever questions you have.
talk_09:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>The altitude here is incredibly high. It is
no easy task to descend the mountain.<sp:0:4:0>That is why I am preparing <clr:0000>wing<clr:ffff>-type<clr:0000>
Zonai devices<clr:ffff>. They are useful tools for
making your descent.<sp:0:4:0><clr:0000>Zonai capsules<clr:ffff> are very convenient.
They are a portable form of <clr:0000>Zonai device<clr:ffff>
that you can retrieve at any time.<sp:0:4:0>I suggest that you deposit resources in
the device dispenser before proceeding.
talk_20:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>I recall the <clr:0000>Maker Construct <clr:ffff>by the
riverside at the base of the mountain
having a spare <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.
talk_21:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>We will speak again when you come into
possession of an <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.
talk_22:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>The <clr:0000>Maker Construct <clr:ffff>by the riverside at
the base of the mountain should have a
spare <clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.
talk_23:
<sp:3:0:2:0800>Oh? <sp:5:0:0>You seem to have finally acquired an
<clr:0000>Energy Cell<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>This will enable you to use Zonai devices.<sp:5:0:0>
<clr:0000>Device dispensers<clr:ffff> are now also available
for your use.
talk_24:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Pardon this late explanation. <sp:5:0:0>I prepare
<clr:0000>Zonai devices<clr:ffff> here that are useful for
descending the mountain.<sp:0:4:0>The difficulty of descending the mountain
from this high perch <sp:5:0:0>calls for the <clr:0000>wing<clr:ffff>-
type <clr:0000>Zonai device<clr:ffff>.
talk_25:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>This <clr:0000>device dispenser<clr:ffff><sp:5:0:0> can provide you
with one.
talk_12:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><clr:0000>Device dispensers<clr:ffff> make it possible to
produce portable Zonai devices in the
form of <clr:0000>Zonai capsules<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0>They are simple to use.<sp:5:0:0> Hold materials in
your hands. Then place them into the
receptacle. It is similar to a cooking pot.<sp:0:4:0>Accepted resources are things such as
<clr:0000>construct horns <clr:ffff>or <clr:0000>Zonai charges<clr:ffff>.<sp:0:4:0><sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:Happy>The altitude here is incredibly high. The
<clr:0000>wing-type Zonai devices<clr:ffff> are useful tools
for making your descent.<sp:0:4:0>I suggest that you deposit resources in
the device dispenser before proceeding.
talk_26:
<sp:3:0:2:0700>Do you see the bowl-like receptacle? Hold
resources in your hands and deposit them
there. The dispenser will process them.<sp:0:4:0>You can insert resources such as
<clr:0000>construct horns<clr:ffff> and <clr:0000>Zonai charges<clr:ffff> to
receive Zonai devices in return.
talk_00:
<sp:3:0:2:0700><snd:SurpriseS>This is a rarity. <sp:5:0:0>It is unusual for me to
receive visitors here.<sp:0:4:0>I assume you will require Zonai devices
to descend the mountain. Would you like
to use the <clr:0000>device dispenser<clr:ffff>?
